titles.title: To amend title 31, United States Code, with respect to FinCEN no-action letters, and for other purposes.
To amend title 31, United States Code, with respect to FinCEN no-action letters, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: This bill directs the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network to issue regulations regarding the issuance of no-action letters in response to inquiries concerning the application of certain anti-money-laundering and counter-terrorist-financing laws or regulations.
